isis.stitle: ALLISON WT TRANSMISSION ELECTRONIC CONTROLS - ELECTRICAL OPERATION - DATA LINK CONNECTOR (419)

svcproc.title: DATA LINK CONNECTOR (419)
svcproc.para: The data link connector 419-C (connector 419, cavity C) receives direct battery power from the circuit 329 connection to start solenoid, on circuit A136D at cavity (C). Note in the circuit diagram that the circuit does not go through the Main Power fuse in the VIM. The data link connector is grounded through cavity (E) at starter mounting bolt (GRD 1).
Data link connector cavities (A) and (B) are the positive and negative serial communications links that enable the DDR to read diagnostic codes from the ECU.
